tool_description: Tracks and estimates delivery lead times for bathroom fixtures from various suppliers and manufacturers.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to track lead times for

order_date.description: Planned order date for accurate lead time calculation

error_messages: Invalid ZIP code: Provide a valid 5-digit US ZIP code for delivery estimates
Invalid order date: Use ISO 8601 format for date-time
Lead time data unavailable: Some products may not have current availability information
Delivery location not serviceable: Some suppliers may not deliver to the specified location
usage: Provide product_ids and delivery_zip_code for location-specific lead times. Include order_date for more accurate timing estimates.

estimated_lead_times.description: Array of estimated lead times in days for each product

availability_status.description: Array of availability status: in_stock, backordered, discontinued, special_order

delivery_dates.description: Array of estimated delivery dates for each product

expedited_options.description: Array indicating if expedited shipping is available for each product
